title.rendered: Aqualis ASA : Mandatory notification of trade

content.rendered:
Oslo, 02 Mars 2015

On 02 Mars 2015, Aman Marine Ltd, a company controlled by Reuben Segal, Director Middle East at Aqualis, acquired 442 shares at an average purchase price of NOK 6.50 per share. After this transaction Reuben Segal, and related parties, hold 811’964 shares in Aqualis ASA.

*****

Contact:

Christian Opsahl
CFO
+47 901 101 53
christian.opsahl@aqualisbraemar.com

This information is subject of the disclosure requirements pursuant to section 5-12 of the Norwegian Securities Trading Act.
